mapper.select: SELECT GROUP_CODE AS groupCode, CODE AS code, CODE_NAME AS codeName, NOTE_1 AS note1, NOTE_2 AS note2, NOTE_3 AS note3, NOTE_4 AS note4, SORT_SEQUENCE AS sortSequence, USE_YN AS useYn, CREATE_DATETIME AS createDatetime, CREATE_USER AS createUser, EDIT_DATETIME AS editDatetime, EDIT_USER AS editUser FROM CM_DETAIL_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE = #{groupCode} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SEQUENCE ASC
